verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

And <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, wilt thou <S%H8199>judge<s%>, wilt thou <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>? then cause her to <S%H3045>know<s%> all her <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: A <S%H5892>city<s%> that <S%H8210>sheddeth<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H6256>her<s%>, that her time may <S%H935>come<s%>, and that <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H1544>idols<s%> against herself to defile <S%H2930>her<s%>!

Thou art become <S%H816>guilty<s%> in thy <S%H1818>blood<s%> that thou hast <S%H8210>shed<s%>, and art <S%H2930>defiled<s%> in thine <S%H1544>idols<s%> which thou hast <S%H6213>made<s%>; and thou hast caused thy <S%H3117>days<s%> to draw <S%H7126>near<s%>, and art <S%H935>come<s%> even unto thy <S%H8141>years<s%>: therefore have I <S%H5414>made<s%> thee a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> unto the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and a <S%H7048>mocking<s%> to all the <S%H776>countries<s%>.
Those that are <S%H7138>near<s%>, and those that are <S%H7350>far<s%> from <S%H7046>thee<s%>, shall mock <S%H2931>thee<s%>, thou infamous one and <S%H7227>full<s%> of <S%H4103>tumult<s%>.
Behold <S%H5387><s%>, the princes of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H2220>power<s%>, have been in thee to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

In thee have they set <S%H7043>light<s%> by <S%H1>father<s%> and <S%H517>mother<s%>; in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee have they <S%H6213>dealt<s%> by <S%H6233>oppression<s%> with the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%>; in thee have they <S%H3238>wronged<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and the <S%H490>widow<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H959>despised<s%> my holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, and hast <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>.

Slanderous <S%H7400><s%> <S%H582>men<s%> have been in thee to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>; and in thee they have <S%H398>eaten<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>: in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H2154>lewdness<s%>.
In thee have they <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>; in thee have they <S%H6031>humbled<s%> her that was <S%H5079>unclean<s%> in her <S%H2931>impurity<s%>.

And <S%H376>one<s%> hath <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>; and <S%H376>another<s%> hath <S%H2154>lewdly<s%> <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H3618>daughter-in<s%>-law; and <S%H376>another<s%> in thee hath <S%H6031>humbled<s%> his <S%H269>sister<s%>, his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>.

In thee have they <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H7810>bribes<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>; thou hast <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H5392>interest<s%> and <S%H8636>increase<s%>, and thou hast greedily <S%H1214>gained<s%> of thy <S%H7453>neighbors<s%> by <S%H6233>oppression<s%>, and hast <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

Behold <S%H5221><s%>, therefore, I have smitten my <S%H3709>hand<s%> at thy dishonest <S%H1215>gain<s%> which thou hast <S%H6213>made<s%>, and at thy <S%H1818>blood<s%> which hath been in the midst of <S%H8432>thee<s%>.

Can thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5975>endure<s%>, or can thy <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, in the <S%H3117>days<s%> that I shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with <S%H3068>thee<s%>? I, Jehovah, have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>, and will do it.

And I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> thee among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> thee through the <S%H776>countries<s%>; and I will <S%H8552>consume<s%> thy filthiness out of <S%H2932>thee<s%>.
And thou shalt be <S%H2490>profaned<s%> in <S%H5869>thyself<s%>, in the sight of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is become <S%H5509>dross<s%> unto <S%H5178>me<s%>: all of them are brass and <S%H913>tin<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%> and <S%H5777>lead<s%>, in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace<s%>; they are the <S%H5509>dross<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: Because ye are all become <S%H5509>dross<s%>, <S%H6908>therefore<s%>, behold, I will gather you into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

As they <S%H6910>gather<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%> and <S%H5777>lead<s%> and <S%H913>tin<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace<s%>, to <S%H5301>blow<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> upon <S%H5413>it<s%>, to melt <S%H6908>it<s%>; so will I gather you in mine <S%H639>anger<s%> and in my <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, and I will <S%H3240>lay<s%> you <S%H5413>there<s%>, and melt you.
Yea <S%H3664><s%>, I will gather <S%H5301>you<s%>, and blow upon you with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath<s%>, and ye shall be <S%H5413>melted<s%> in the midst <S%H8432>thereof<s%>.

As <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H2046>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace<s%>, so shall ye be <S%H5413>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H3045>thereof<s%>; and ye shall know that <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, have poured <S%H8210>out<s%> my wrath upon <S%H2534>you<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H776>her<s%>, Thou art a land that is not <S%H2891>cleansed<s%>, nor <S%H1656>rained<s%> upon in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2195>indignation<s%>.

There is a <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> of her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H7580>thereof<s%>, like a roaring <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H2963>ravening<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%>: they have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%>; they <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2633>treasure<s%> and precious <S%H3366>things<s%>; they have made her <S%H490>widows<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> in the midst <S%H8432>thereof<s%>.

Her <S%H3548>priests<s%> have done <S%H2554>violence<s%> to my <S%H8451>law<s%>, and have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my holy <S%H6944>things<s%>: they have made no <S%H914>distinction<s%> between the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and the <S%H2455>common<s%>, neither have they caused men to <S%H3045>discern<s%> between the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%>, and have <S%H5956>hid<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, and I am <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

Her <S%H8269>princes<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> thereof are like <S%H2061>wolves<s%> <S%H2963>ravening<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%>, to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and to <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%>, that they may <S%H1214>get<s%> dishonest <S%H1215>gain<s%>.

And her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H2902>daubed<s%> for them with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> <S%H2374>mortar<s%>, seeing <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7080>visions<s%>, and divining <S%H3577>lies<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, when <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath not <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

The <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> have used <S%H6231>oppression<s%>, and <S%H1497>exercised<s%> <S%H1498>robbery<s%>; <S%H3238>yea<s%>, they have vexed the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>, and have <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> <S%H4941>wrongfully<s%>.

And I <S%H1245>sought<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%> among <S%H1443>them<s%>, that should build up the <S%H1447>wall<s%>, and <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H6556>gap<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me for the <S%H776>land<s%>, that I should not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H4672>it<s%>; but I found none.

Therefore have I poured <S%H8210>out<s%> mine <S%H2195>indignation<s%> upon <S%H3615>them<s%>; I have consumed them with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath<s%>: their own <S%H1870>way<s%> have I <S%H5414>brought<s%> upon their <S%H7218>heads<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
